title: The Biggest Mistake In The History Of The FBI (Ep 1827)
description:
In this episode, I address the exploding backlash to the police state raid of Donald Trump’s residence. 

News Picks:

How do we get rid of the FBI?


Inflation surged again to 8.5%.

Another Trump ally under attack by the FBI. 

U.S. Labor Productivity Suffers Biggest Crash Ever Recorded, Labor Costs Soar Most Since 1982.

Turley: Time for a "NATO" of red states to combat progressive boycotts.

Liberals and FBI Want to Redefine Things When It Comes to Trump Raid.


Liberals are protecting people looking to sexually groom kids.
